actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to provide for a study of certain consequences of the decommissioning, disposal, and decontamination of elements involved in the utilization of nuclear energy.

summary.text: Directs the Assistant Administrator for Environment and Safety of the Energy Research and Development Administration to study the environmental, health, safety, and economic consequences of the disposal of elements involved in the utilization of nuclear fission energy.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a study of certain consequences of the decommissioning, disposal, and decontamination of elements involved in the utilization of nuclear energy.
